Room.Name: Millwood Mayor's Office Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: The hallway turns to the north and dead ends. There are two doors on the east and west walls of the hallway. Heading south returns to the foyer.
Room.LongDescription: The long hallway seems to drag on, but you know you haven't really gone all that far. After all, the building wasn't that big. You finally come to two large doors, one on the east wall and one of the west wall. The plaque above the east door says "Mayor's Office" and the one on the west door has "Keep Out" scribbled across it in dried blood. There is no plaque on this door, but you can see by the dust outline that it was there originally.
